intro.p: Use the information given and your knowledge of trig ratios to answer the question.

content.p: A drone is hovering in the air, and you are standing {{H_dist}} meters horizontally from the point directly beneath it. You look up at a {{angle}}^{\circ} angle to see the drone. How high is the drone above the ground? Explain how you figured it out. Show all work and give your answer rounded to two decimal places.

outtro.p: Use tan( {{angle}} ) to find the height. The drone is {{high}} meters above the ground
